entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Indin River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:46 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 33 with temperature rising to minus 29 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 33 with temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill minus 46 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
